JobFullDesc:
Elastic is a search company built on a free and open heritage. Anyone can use Elastic products and solutions to get started quickly and frictionlessly. Elastic offers three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security, built on one technology stack that can be deployed anywhere. From finding documents to monitoring infrastructure to hunting for threats, Elastic makes data usable in real time and at scale. Thousands of organizations worldwide, including Cisco, eBay, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, The Mayo Clinic, NASA, The New York Times, Wikipedia, and Verizon, use Elastic to power mission-critical systems. Founded in 2012, Elastic is a distributed company with Elasticians around the globe and is publicly traded on the NYSE under the symbol ESTC. Learn more at elastic.co.

To support our continued growth, we are looking for an experienced Manager of Revenue Growth Initiatives to develop and implement strategic go-to-market initiatives for Field Operations. As a founding member, you will help build the Revenue Growth Office, which operates like an internal consulting group, working only on go-to-market initiatives that are top priorities for leadership, requiring the ability to navigate extreme ambiguity, and managing stakeholders by influence. Typically, these initiatives are aimed at increasing revenue growth, enhancing customer experience, and/or improving GTM effectiveness and efficiency.
As a Manager of Revenue Growth Initiatives, you will report into the Senior Director of GTM Strategy and Planning, and fully immerse yourself in organizing and leading high-profile strategic initiatives. Key elements of this role include developing a business case and strategy to achieve an ambitious goal, collaborating with a large group of cross-functional stakeholders to develop an impactful solution, and orchestrating cross-functional teams to implement a coherent plan. You will either work alone or with another member of the RGO team, to drive the strategic initiatives, taking ownership of initiative outcomes and deliverables. You will also use storytelling skills and presentations to persuasively communicate your recommendations to leadership, and influence teams to make decisions and mobilize them toward executions. Over time you will build lasting relationships with colleagues across Elastic, enabling you to execute rapidly with cross-functional support.
This role is distributed/remote, open to all locations in the United States.

What You Will Be Doing:

Driving highly visible go-to-market initiatives for Elastic that increases growth and/or improves GTM effectiveness and efficiencyIdentifying revenue growth opportunities, crafting business proposals with clear ROI and business outcomes, and presenting to leadership for prioritization and approvalDesigning impactful solutions and coherent execution plans through collaboration with cross-functional teams and key stakeholdersImplementing and operationalize the strategic initiatives to achieve desired outcomes and instill as standard operating procedureCollaborate, partner, and orchestrate cross-functionally through all aspects of the initiative to ensure rigor, thoroughness, buy-in and adoptionMeasuring, monitoring, and advising through the implementation to ensure success and achieve initiative goals

What You Bring Along:

5+ years of relevant work experience in management consulting and/or internal consulting (e.g., business / GTM strategy, business operations or other equivalent functions)Minimum of 2 years of post-MBA experience in both management consulting and engagement managementMBA or other advanced degree, preferably in strategy, business, or marketing, from a top academic institutionKnowledge of go-to-market (e.g., sale, marketing, success) especially in a SaaS environmentProven track record of structuring ambiguous problems, develop solutions, and craft recommendations and results into easily digestible messages, communications, and executive presentationVery strong executive presence, and engagement and interpersonal skillsHighly collaborative style with strong influencing skills, able to build effective work relationships at all levels of the organization to influence behavior and manage changeProactive self starter, with a bias for action, taking the initiative to drive work independently and cross-functionallyExcellent engagement manager and change agent, able to apply project management toolkits as appropriateAbility to thrive in a fast-paced start-up environmentAbility to build effective work relationships at all levels of the organization, influence behavior, and manage changeA sense of humor and ability to roll with the punches definitely a plus
